meanings.definition: A pointing device consisting of a ball held in a socket containing sensors to detect rotation of the ball about two axes
meanings.sent1: The trackball on my computer helps me move the cursor easily.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using a trackball instead of a mouse for precise movements.
meanings.sent3: When the trackball got stuck, the cursor started dancing around the screen!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a trackball, smoothly navigating through complex ideas.
meanings.sent5: The trackball, like a tiny globe, controlled the digital world at my fingertips.

meanings.definition: A small ball set in a holder that can be rotated by hand to move a cursor on a computer screen
meanings.sent1: With a gentle touch, you can move the cursor using the trackball.
meanings.sent2: The trackball is a convenient alternative to traditional computer mice.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the trackball, and it rolled away like a mischievous marble.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a trackball, spinning ideas into reality with every turn.
meanings.sent5: The trackball glowed under her fingertips, guiding her through the digital maze.
